articles.title: MIT engineers build a battery-free, wireless underwater camera - MIT News
articles.description: MIT researchers built a battery-free, wireless underwater camera, powered by sound waves, that can take high-quality, color images, even in dark environments. It transmits image data through the open water to a receiver that reconstructs the color image.
